name: CVE-2010-0326
description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Developer log (devlog) extension 2.9.1 and earlier for TYPO3 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.
pattern: [((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:francois_suter:devlog:2.7.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:francois_suter:devlog:2.4.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:francois_suter:devlog:2.3.3:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:francois_suter:devlog:2.6.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:francois_suter:devlog:2.3.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:rene_fritz:devlog:1.1.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:francois_suter:devlog:2.0.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:francois_suter:devlog:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:francois_suter:devlog:2.9.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:francois_suter:devlog:2.5.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:francois_suter:devlog:2.3.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:francois_suter:devlog:2.2.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:francois_suter:devlog:2.1.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:francois_suter:devlog:2.8.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:francois_suter:devlog:2.3.2:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:typo3:typo3:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*'))]
